TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowItemsPresenter extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl implements class System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeView, class System.Activities.Presentation.IMultipleDragEnabledCompositeView
Public Class WorkflowItemsPresenter Inherits ContentControl Implements IMultipleDragEnabledCompositeView

summary.span: 代表控制項，這個控制項可用於在設計介面中顯示物件集合。

span.span: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of objects on a design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是第二個索引鍵是以集合為基礎的 Windows Workflow Foundation 設計工具基礎結構所提供的 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 控制項。The is the second key Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) control provided by the Windows Workflow Foundation designer infrastructure that is collection-based. 雖然可顯示及編輯單一包含項目是以集合為基礎，會顯示視覺效果，並且支援所提供的項目集合的屬性。While the enables the display and the editing of a single contained element, the is collection-based, displays a visualization, and supports editing of the collection of items provided by the property. 除了可讓多個以視覺化方式檢視和編輯，集合中包含的項目`WorkflowItemsPresenter`也可讓集合導向的動作，例如，從集合中刪除項目集合中的指定索引處插入項目和移動到另一個索引項目。In addition to allowing the multiple items contained in the collection to be visualized and edited, the `WorkflowItemsPresenter` also enables collection-oriented actions, such as inserting an item at a given index in the collection, deleting an item from the collection, and moving an item from one index to another. `WorkflowItemsPresenter` 也同時控制代碼會合併動作，例如各種主持人之間拖曳，並允許進行復原的單一動作中編輯。使用在設計介面上呈現單一物件。`WorkflowItemsPresenter` also handles combined actions, such as dragging between the various presenters and allowing that edit to occur in a single, undoable action.Use to present a single object on a design surface. 如需在使用中，請參閱[自訂複合設計工具-工作流程項目展示器](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-designers-workflow-items-presenter.md)範例。For an example of the in use, see the [Custom Composite Designers - Workflow Items Presenter](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-designers-workflow-items-presenter.md) sample. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼示範如何建置平行活動的設計工具。The following sample code shows how you can build a designer for the Parallel activity. 請注意項目的 ModelItem.Branches 繫結。Note the binding to ModelItem.Branches for the Items. ```xaml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過提供自訂的面板範本，您可以自訂及控制所包含項目的配置。By providing a custom panel template, you can customize and control the layout of the contained items. 預設值以垂直方向上`StackPanel`。The default is based on a vertically oriented `StackPanel`. 舉例來說，`ItemsPanel`的設計工具活動以水平方向上`StackPanel`。As an illustration, the `ItemsPanel` for the designer of activities is based on a horizontally oriented `StackPanel`. ## Examples 下列範例中會顯示 XAML`ItemsPanel`的設計工具為基礎的活動上水平方向`StackPanel`。The following example in XAML shows the `ItemsPanel` for the designer of activities that is based on a horizontally oriented `StackPanel`. ```xaml ```
